rioko.graphabstraction.draw2d.listeners

Class ModelNodeFigureMouseListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • rioko.draw2d.listeners.ComposeMouseListener
      • rioko.graphabstraction.draw2d.listeners.ModelNodeFigureMouseListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.draw2d.MouseListener, org.eclipse.draw2d.MouseMotionListener

    public class ModelNodeFigureMouseListener
extends rioko.draw2d.listeners.ComposeMouseListener
    Specific ComposeMouseListener which put together the ChangeColorOnFocusListener and DraggingMouseListener. It is used by ModelNodeFigure as standard MouseListener.
    Author:
    Antonio

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.eclipse.draw2d.MouseListener

        org.eclipse.draw2d.MouseListener.Stub

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.eclipse.draw2d.MouseMotionListener

        org.eclipse.draw2d.MouseMotionListener.Stub

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ModelNodeFigureMouseListener(org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Color gained, org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Color lost, org.eclipse.draw2d.IFigure figure)
      Generic builder with the parameters needed by ChangeColorOnFocusListener and DraggingMouseListener

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class rioko.draw2d.listeners.ComposeMouseListener

        addMouseListener, mouseDoubleClicked, mouseDragged, mouseEntered, mouseExited, mouseHover, mouseMoved, mousePressed, mouseReleased, remoceMouseListener

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • ModelNodeFigureMouseListener

        public ModelNodeFigureMouseListener(org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Color gained,
                                    org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Color lost,
                                    org.eclipse.draw2d.IFigure figure)
        Generic builder with the parameters needed by ChangeColorOnFocusListener and DraggingMouseListener
        Parameters:
        gained - Color that will be put when the Figure get the focus
        lost - Color that will be put when the Figure lose the focus
        figure - Figure that will be related with this listener
